Properties.string: Hold down mouse to charge up laser

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by SolarCrane
local Tool = script.Parent --plr=game.Players.localPlayer
local buttonUp = false
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local Mouse
local sparkleHolder local startColor = Vector3.new(0, 0, 255) local endColor = Vector3.new(255, 0, 0)
local timeToTarget = 1.25
local myHumanoid
-- Animation local ChargeAnim
-- Create the pig mesh local pig = Instance.new('SpecialMesh', rightParticle) pig.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=15898670' pig.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=15898665'
function checkintangible(hit) if hit and hit~=nil then if hit:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) or hit.Transparency>.9 or hit.Name=="Handle" or hit.Name=="Effect" or hit.Name=="Bullet" or hit.Name=="Laser" or string.lower(hit.Name)=="water" then return true end end return false end
function castray(startpos,vec,length,ignore,delayifhit) local hit,endpos2=game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startpos,vec*length),ignore) if hit~=nil then if checkintangible(hit) then if delayifhit then wait() end hit,endpos2=castray(endpos2+(vec*.01),vec,length-((startpos-endpos2).magnitude),ignore,delayifhit) end end return hit,endpos2 end
-- Todo: improve to use proper tail-call recursion -- http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/11/your-mother-is-so-fat-her-mass-causes-a-stack-overflow.jpg function calculateMassRecursive(rootPart) local sum = 0 if rootPart:IsA('Part') then sum = sum + rootPart:GetMass() end for _, v in pairs(rootPart:GetChildren()) do sum = sum + calculateMassRecursive(v) end return sum end
function shootParticles(origin, distance, vDirection) local rightParticle = Instance.new('Part', Workspace) RBX_Debris:AddItem(rightParticle, timeToTarget * 2) rightParticle.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball rightParticle.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Symmetric rightParticle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) rightParticle.CanCollide = false --local vTorso = Tool.Parent.Torso --local origin = vTorso.CFrame.p local lookDir = vDirection local rightDir = lookDir:Cross(Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)).unit local outwardDir = rightDir * (distance / (2 * timeToTarget)) * 2 local mass = calculateMassRecursive(rightParticle)
rightParticle.Velocity = outwardDir -- Using the freefall equation we can derive that F = M * V0 / -t local comeBackForce = mass * rightParticle.Velocity / timeToTarget * -1 local floatingForce = Vector3.new(0, mass * 196.2, 0) local forwardVel = lookDir * (distance / (2 * timeToTarget)) rightParticle.Velocity = rightParticle.Velocity + forwardVel rightParticle.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(math.rad(math.random(-360, 360)) * 2, math.rad(math.random(-360, 360)) * 2, math.rad(math.random(-360, 360)) * 2) --rightParticle.CFrame = CFrame.new(origin, origin + rightParticle.Velocity) rightParticle.Position = origin local counteringForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') counteringForce.force = comeBackForce + floatingForce counteringForce.Parent = rightParticle counteringForce.Name = 'CounteringForce'
-- Add some fire to the particle local fire = Instance.new('Fire', rightParticle) fire.Size = 1 fire.Heat = 1 fire.Color = Color3.new(10/255, 10/255, 10/255)
pig:Clone().Parent = rightParticle
local leftParticle = rightParticle:Clone() leftParticle.Name = 'LeftParticle' leftParticle.Parent = Workspace RBX_Debris:AddItem(leftParticle, timeToTarget * 2) leftParticle.Velocity = forwardVel + -1 * outwardDir --leftParticle.CFrame = CFrame.new(origin, origin + leftParticle.Velocity) leftParticle:FindFirstChild('CounteringForce').force = floatingForce + (comeBackForce * -1)
-- For now I am going to do a wait until the particles collide -- it may be better in the future to actual create a triger volume at the expected destination wait(timeToTarget * 2) if Tool:FindFirstChild('ExplosionScript') then local scriptCopy = Tool:FindFirstChild('ExplosionScript'):Clone() scriptCopy.Parent = leftParticle scriptCopy.Disabled = false local explosionCopy = Tool:FindFirstChild('Explosion'):Clone() explosionCopy.Parent = leftParticle wait(0.1) scriptCopy.Disabled = true end local hitLocation = origin + forwardVel * timeToTarget * 2 local explosion = Instance.new('Explosion', Workspace) explosion.Position = hitLocation explosion.BlastRadius = 15 --fire.Anchored = true
end
function mouseUp() buttonUp = true if Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value == 100 then --fire print("Firing") Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value = 0 local vTorso = Tool.Parent.Torso local startpos = vTorso.CFrame.p if Tool and Tool.Handle then startpos = Tool.Handle.Position end local vDirection = vTorso.CFrame.lookVector if Mouse then vDirection = (Mouse.Hit.p-startpos).unit end local hit, loc = castray(startpos, (Mouse.Hit.p-startpos).unit, 200, Tool.Parent, false) local distance = 150 if hit and distance > 20 then distance = (loc - startpos).magnitude end if sparkleHolder and sparkleHolder:FindFirstChild('Sparkles') then sparkleHolder:FindFirstChild('Sparkles'):Remove() if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Stop() end end shootParticles(startpos, distance, vDirection) end end
function mouseDown() buttonUp = false while not buttonUp do wait(0.1) if not sparkleHolder then sparkleHolder = Instance.new("Part", Tool) sparkleHolder.Transparency = 1 sparkleHolder.CanCollide= false sparkleHolder.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) sparkleHolder.Position = Tool.Handle.Position local Weld = Instance.new("ManualWeld") Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) Weld.C1 = CFrame.new(0.049407959, 0.30989188, -1.74499893, 0.999999881, -0.000551184872, -5.29387343e-008, 0.000551184872, 0.999999762, 1.45519152e-011, 4.31729106e-008, -1.45519152e-011, 1) Weld.Part0 = sparkleHolder Weld.Part1 = Tool.Handle Weld.Parent = sparkleHolder end Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value = Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value + 10 if Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value > 20 and sparkleHolder and not sparkleHolder:FindFirstChild('Sparkles') then local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles", sparkleHolder) sparkles.Name = 'Sparkles' --if ChargeAnim:IsNotPlaying() then if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Play() end --end end if sparkleHolder:FindFirstChild('Sparkles') then local vCurrSparkleColor = startColor:Lerp(endColor, Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value / 100) sparkleHolder:FindFirstChild('Sparkles').SparkleColor = Color3.new(vCurrSparkleColor.x, vCurrSparkleColor.y, vCurrSparkleColor.z) end --sparkleHolder.Sparkles.Size = Vector3.new(charge / 20, charge / 20, charge / 20) --print('Charging ' .. charge) end end
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Value = 1 myHumanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ChargeAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.UnstableCharge) if mouse~=nil then if not Tool.Enabled then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(2) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse = mouse Mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" Mouse.Button1Down:connect(mouseDown) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(mouseUp) end end
function onUnequipped() myHumanoid = nil if sparkleHolder then sparkleHolder:Remove() sparkleHolder = nil end if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Stop() ChargeAnim = nil end buttonUp = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--SolarCrane function waitForChild(parent, childName) local child = parent:findFirstChild(childName) if child then return child end while true do child = parent.ChildAdded:wait() if child.Name==childName then return child end end end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Launch = waitForChild(Tool, 'Launch')
local PostShot = waitForChild(Tool, 'PostShot')
local PoweringUp = waitForChild(Tool, 'PoweringUp')
function ChargeSoundLogic(value, sound) print('Charge Changed Event ' .. value) if value == 0 then -- this means it was just fired if Launch then Launch:Play() wait(0.2) PostShot:Play() end elseif value < 20 then if sound then --and sound.IsPlaying then sound:Stop() print('Charge Up Stopped ' .. value) end else if sound then -- and sound.IsPaused then sound:Play() sound.Volume = value / 100 print('Charge Up Playing ' .. value) end end end
function onUnequipped() if PostShot then PostShot:Stop() end if PoweringUp then PoweringUp:Stop() end if Launch then Launch:Stop() end end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Tool:FindFirstChild('Charge').Changed:connect( function(value) ChargeSoundLogic(value, PoweringUp) end )

function waitForChild(parent, childName) local child = parent:findFirstChild(childName) if child then return child end while true do child = parent.ChildAdded:wait() if child.Name==childName then return child end end end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Explosion = waitForChild(Tool, 'Explosion') Explosion.Volume = 2.5
function explode() if Explosion then Explosion:Play() end end
explode()
